Feats: Elemental Adept (Cold); Elemental Adept (Thunder); Magic Initiate (Wizard); Mounted Combatant; Tavern Brawler Human Features: Human Ability Adjustment; Language (Common; Choose 1 from any) Druid Features: Archdruid; Armor Proficiency (Light; Medium; Shield); Beast Spells; Blazing Revival; Cantrip Versatility; Cauterizing Flames; Circle Of Spores; Circle Of Stars; Circle Of Wildfire; Cosmic Omen; Druid Circle; Druidic; Enhanced Bond; Full Of Stars; Fungal Body; Fungal Infestation; Halo Of Spores; Save Proficiency (Intelligence; Wisdom); Skill Proficiency (Choose 2 from Arcana, Animal Handling, Insight, Medicine, Nature, Perception, Religion, Survival); Spellcasting; Spreading Spores; Star Map; Starry Form; Summon Wildfire Spirit; Symbiotic Entity; Timeless Body (Druid); Tool Proficiency (Herbalism Kit); Twinkling Constellations; Weapon Proficiency (Club; Dagger; Dart; Javelin; Mace; Quarterstaff; Scimitar; Sickle; Sling; Spear); Wild Companion; Wild Shape Acolyte Features: Language (Choose 2 from any); Shelter Of The Faithful; Skill Proficiency (Insight; Religion)
Feature Notes:
Druid Circle: 1 selection
Cantrip Versatility: May replace a cantrip when boosting an ability or taking a feat
Shelter Of The Faithful: Can receive aid from temples of Greek-Tyche and fellow believers
Timeless Body (Druid): Ages at 1/10 normal rate

Tool Proficiency: Herbalism Kit
Languages: Common; Draconic; Elvish; Halfling
Skill Notes: Druidic: Speaks a secret language known only by druids
Combat
Hit Points: 140 Initiative: 1 Armor Class: 15 Attacks Per Round: 1
Armor Proficiency: Light; Medium; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Club; Dagger; Dart; Improvised; Javelin; Mace; Quarterstaff; Scimitar; Sickle; Sling; Spear
Armor: Breastplate Shield: None Weapons: Scimitar (+7 1d6+1); Sling (+7 1d4+1 R30/120); Unarmed (+6 1d4)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +60
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +1
Tavern Brawler: Weapon Proficiency (Improvised)/Unarmed attacks inflict 1d4 HP
Fungal Body: Immune to critical hits
Halo Of Spores: R10' May use Reaction to inflict 1d10 HP necrotic on target (DC 16 Constitution neg)
Mounted Combatant: Has advantage on melee attacks on an unmounted foe smaller than mount and can redirect attacks on mount to self
Spreading Spores: May use a bonus action to move Halo Of Spores 30'
Symbiotic Entity: May expend 1 Wild Shape use to gain 80 temporary HP, dbl Halo Of Spores damage, and +1d6 HP necrotic on melee hits for 10 min or until temporary HP lost
Tavern Brawler: Can use a bonus action to grapple after a successful unarmed or improvised attack
Save Proficiency: Intelligence; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 2; Constitution: 3; Dexterity: 1; Intelligence: 6; Strength: 0; Wisdom: 8
Save Notes:
Full Of Stars: Starry Form gives resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage
Fungal Body: Immune to blinded, deafened, frightened, and poisoned conditions
Mounted Combatant: Mount suffers no damage on a successful Dexterity save and half on failure
Magic
Spell Slots: D0: 4; D1: 4; D2: 3; D3: 3; D4: 3; D5: 3; D6: 2; D7: 2; D8: 1; D9: 1; W0: 2; W1: 1 Attack: D: 8; W: 6 Spell DC: D: 16; W: 14
Spells:
Animal Friendship (D1 Ench): R30' Convinces target beast that self is harmless (save Wisdom negates; Intelligence 4 or higher immune) for 1 day or until harmed [+Level affects +1 target]
Animate Dead (D3 [Circle Of Spores] Necr): R10' Bones or the corpse of a Medium or Small creature becomes a skeleton or zombie that obeys commands when within 60' for 1 day [+Level animates +2 undead]
Aura Of Life (D4 [Circle Of Wildfire] Abju): 30' radius gives nonhostile creatures resistance to necrotic damage and immunity to maximum hit point reduction, and raises those with 0 hit points to 1 hit point, for concentration up to 10 min
Awaken (D5 Tran): Touched beast or plant gains Intelligence 10, speech, and movement and becomes charmed for 30 days or until harmed
Beast Sense (D2 Divi): Self can perceive through a touched willing beast's senses for concentration up to 1 hr [R]
Blight (D4 [Circle Of Spores] Necr): R30' Inflicts 8d8 HP necrotic (save Constitution half; plant target has disadvantage on the save and suffers maximum damage on failure) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Blindness/Deafness (D2 [Circle Of Spores] Necr): R30' Inflicts a choice of blindness or deafness (save Constitution ends) for 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Burning Hands (D1 [Circle Of Wildfire] Evoc): 15' cone inflicts 3d6 HP fire (save Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Chill Touch (D0 [Circle Of Spores] Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic and target cannot regain hit points for 1 rd; undead also suffer disadvantage vs. self attack for 1 rd
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic and target cannot regain hit points for 1 rd; undead also suffer disadvantage vs. self attack for 1 rd
Cloudkill (D5 [Circle Of Spores] Conj): R120' 20' radius inflicts 5d8 HP poison (save Constitution half) and moves away 10' per rd for concentration up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Confusion (D4 [Circle Of Spores] Ench): R90' Creatures in a 10' radius randomly: 10% wander; 50% do nothing; 20% attack an adjacent creature; 20% act normally (save Wisdom negates) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level increases the radius by 5']
Conjure Animals (D3 Conj): R60' Summons a choice of 1, 2, 4, or 8 obedient CR 2, 1, half, or quarter fey spirits in beast form for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level doubles, triples, or quadruples the number of animals at level 5, 7, or 9]
Conjure Fey (D6 Conj): R90' Summons an obedient CR 6 fey for 1 hr; loss of concentration makes it hostile [+Level increases the CR by 1]
Conjure Minor Elementals (D4 Conj): R90' Summons a choice of 1, 2, 4, or 8 obedient CR 2, 1, half, or quarter elementals for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level doubles or triples the number of elementals at level 6 or 8]
Contagion (D5 [Circle Of Spores] Necr): Touched suffers poisoned (save Constitution each turn; 3 successes ends, and 3 failures inflict a choice of disease for 7 days)
Cure Wounds (D1 [Circle Of Wildfire] Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+2 hit points [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Darkvision (D2 Tran): Willing touched sees 60' in darkness for 8 hr
Feign Death (D3 Necr): Touched appears dead and gains resistance to non-psychic damage for 1 hr [R]
Find Familiar (D1 [Wild Companion] Conj): R10' Self gains the service of a summoned spirit in animal form that can deliver touch attacks when within 100' [R]
Fire Shield (D4 [Circle Of Wildfire] Evoc): Self gains resistance to a choice of heat or cold damage, and a successful adjacent attacker suffers 2d8 HP fire or cold for 10 min
Fire Storm (D7 Evoc): R150' 10 connected 10' cubes inflict 7d10 HP fire (save Dexterity half) and ignite unattended flammable objects
Flame Strike (D5 [Circle Of Wildfire] Evoc): R60' 10' radius inflicts 4d6 HP fire and 4d6 HP radiant (save Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP of a choice of fire or radiant]
Flaming Sphere (D2 [Circle Of Wildfire] Conj): R60' 5' sphere lights a 20' radius, inflicts 2d6 HP fire (save Dexterity half), ignites unattended flammable objects, and can move 30' per rd for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Friends (W0 Ench): Self gains advantage on Charisma checks with a non-hostile target for concentration up to 1 min; the target becomes hostile afterward
Gaseous Form (D3 [Circle Of Spores] Tran): Touched creature becomes gaseous, gaining a 10' fly Speed and advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saves, for concentration up to 1 hr
Gentle Repose (D2 [Circle Of Spores] Necr): Touched corpse becomes immune to decay and animation for 10 days [R]
Greater Restoration (D5 Abju): Touched recovers from exhausted, charmed, petrified, cursed, or ability damage or regains hit point maximum
Guidance (D0 Divi): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 ability check within concentration up to 1 min
Guidance (D0 [Star Map] Divi): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 ability check within concentration up to 1 min
Guiding Bolt (D1 [Star Map] Evoc): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d6 HP radiant and gives advantage on the next attack on the target within 1 rd [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Gust Of Wind (D2 Evoc): 60'x10' wind pushes 15' (save Strength negates), inflicts half movement, and has a 50% chance of extinguishing flames for concentration up to 1 min
Healing Word (D1 Evoc): R60' Target regains 1d4+2 hit points [+Level restores +1d4 hit points]
Jump (D1 Tran): Touched gains triple jump distance for 1 min
Mass Cure Wounds (D5 [Circle Of Wildfire] Evoc): R60' 6 targets in a 30' radius regain 3d8+2 HP [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Plant Growth (D3 [Circle Of Wildfire] Tran): R150' Causes plants in a 100' radius to overgrow or enriches a 1/2 mile radius for 1 year
Poison Spray (D0 Conj): R10' Inflicts 4d12 HP poison (save Constitution negates)
Polymorph (D4 Tran): R60' Transforms the target creature (save Wisdom negates; shapechangers automatically succeed) for concentration up to 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
Produce Flame (D0 Conj): Lights a 10' radius for 10 min; can be used for a ranged spell attack that inflicts 4d8 HP and ends the spell
Protection From Energy (D3 Abju): Touched gains resistance to a choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage for concentration up to 1 hr
Ray Of Sickness (W1 Necr): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 2d8 HP poison and poisoned for 1 rd (save Constitution HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Reverse Gravity (D7 Tran): R100' Items in a 50' radius fall upward for concentration up to 1 min
Revivify (D3 [Circle Of Wildfire] Necr): Restores life and 1 hit point to a touched 1-minute-old corpse
Scorching Ray (D2 [Circle Of Wildfire] Evoc): R120' 3 ranged attacks inflict 2d6 HP fire each [+Level gives +1 ranged attack]
Shapechange (D9 Tran): Polymorphs self into a familiar living creature of equal or lesser CR for concentration up to 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
Shillelagh (D0 Tran): Held club inflicts +8 magical attacks and 1d8+2 HP damage for 1 min
Sunburst (D8 Evoc): R150' 60' radius inflicts 12d6 HP and blindness (save Constitution half HP only; an additional save each turn ends blindness) for 1 min
Thunderwave (D1 Evoc): 15' cube inflicts 2d8 HP thunder and pushes 10' (save Constitution half HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Wall Of Fire (D4 Evoc): R120' Creates a 60'x20'x1' wall or a 20'x20'x1' ring that inflicts 5d8 HP fire (save Dexterity half) within 10' of a chosen side for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Wall Of Stone (D5 Evoc): R120' Creates 10 10'x10'x6" or 10'x20'x3" panels for concentration up to 10 min
Wall Of Thorns (D6 Conj): R120' Creates a 60'x10'x5' wall or a 20'x20'x5' ring that inflicts 7d8 HP piercing (save Dexterity half) initially, plus half Speed and 7d8 HP slashing to creatures passing through (save Dexterity half) for concentration up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Magic Notes:
Archdruid: Can use Wild Shape at will
Magic Initiate (Wizard): Knows 2 wizard cantrips and can cast a chosen W1 spell once per long rest
Twinkling Constellations: Increased Starry Form effects
Archdruid: Casting spells requires no verbal, somatic, or cost-free material components
Beast Spells: Can cast spells during Wild Shape
Blazing Revival: R120' May extinguish Wildfire Spirit to regain 70 HP when reduced to 0 HP 1/long rest
Cauterizing Flames: R30' May create a spectral flame for 1 min upon a creature death and use it to heal 2d10+2 HP or inflict 2d10+2 HP fire on another in the same space 6/long rest
Cosmic Omen: R30' May use Reaction to give +1d6 or inflict -1d6 on an attack, ability, or save 6/long rest
Elemental Adept (Cold): Spells that inflict cold damage ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Elemental Adept (Thunder): Spells that inflict thunder damage ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Enhanced Bond: Fire spells inflict +1d8 HP fire and healing spells restore +1d8 HP/May cast through Wildfire Spirit
Fungal Infestation: R10' May use Reaction to animate a creature upon death into an obedient 1 HP zombie for 1 hr 2/long rest
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the druid spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Star Map: Knows Guidance cantrip/May cast Guiding Bolt 6/long rest
Starry Form: May spend a Wild Shape use and use a bonus action to change into a constellation of an archer (R60' may use a bonus action to make a ranged spell attack that inflicts 2d8+2 HP radiant), a chalice (R30' casting a healing spell restores 2d8+2 to another), or a dragon (gains a minimum 10 on concentration rolls)
Summon Wildfire Spirit: R30' May spend 1 Wild Shape use to inflict 2d6 HP fire in a 10' radius (DC 16 Dexterity neg) and summon an obedient Wildfire Spirit (AC 13, HP 105, MV/Fly 30', Attack R60' +8 inflicts 1d6+6 HP fire, Teleport targets in 5' radius 15', inflicting 1d6+6 on those left behind (DC 16 Dexterity neg)) for 1 hr
Twinkling Constellations: Dragon Starry Form gives 20' fly Speed/May switch between Starry Forms 1/rd
Wild Companion: May spend 1 Wild Shape use to cast Find Familiar to summon a fey spirit for 10 hr
Wild Shape: Can transform into a CR 1 creature for 10 hr unlimited times per short rest
Notes
Validation Errors: Selectable Feature Allocation: 1 available vs. 3 allocated
